General.Name: Shenzhen Crastal Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Crastal Technology Co.,Ltd. provides small kitchen appliances, and supporting products and services. The company offers pots, electric kettles, toaster, steamers, water dispensers, and ovens through offline and online platforms. Shenzhen Crastal Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
